summary: Teenager Felicity studies at a remote Roman Catholic Church boarding school and seeks indulgence in popular erotic novels Story of O, Emmanuelle and in a lesbian love affair with her friend Jenny.
cast: Glory Annen|Chris Milne|Joni Flynn|Jody Hanson|Marilyn Rodgers|Gordon Charles|John Michael Howson|David Bradshaw|Christine Calcutt|Angela Menzies-Wills|Sarah Lee|Charles Gilroy|John D. Lamond
title: Felicity
